summary: 检测海康威视iVMS-8700综合安防管理平台的getAllUserInfo接口是否存在信息泄露漏洞，可能暴露系统管理员等敏感信息
summary_en: Detect whether the getAllUserInfo interface of Hikvision iVMS-8700 Integrated Security Management Platform has an information leakage vulnerability, which may expose sensitive information such as system administrators
